author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds an example (as a test) of a case where an Alpaka-based EventSetup data product is defined as a template over the Alpaka device type, and uses `PortableCollection` member variables. More specifically it demonstrates a case where one `PortableCollection` member holds an index to an element of the other `PortableCollection`, and this indirection is hidden as an implementation detail for the user of the EventSetup data product (this is more or less the case that @kakwok has with one of the HCAL EventSetup data products).

In addition, the `TestAlgo.dev.cc` is updated to use the `once_per_grid()` helper.

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/721

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run on CPU and on GPU.
title: Example of Alpaka-based EventSetup data product that uses PortableCollection member variables
